MaxRPM.description: Maximum revolutions per minute of the engine

MOI.description: Moment of inertia of the engine around the axis of rotation (Kgm^2).

DampingRateFullThrottle.description: Damping rate of engine when full throttle is applied (Kgm^2/s)

DampingRateZeroThrottleClutchEngaged.description: Damping rate of engine in at zero throttle when the clutch is engaged (Kgm^2/s)

DampingRateZeroThrottleClutchDisengaged.description: Damping rate of engine in at zero throttle when the clutch is disengaged (in neutral gear) (Kgm^2/s)
